xxl.core.util.concurrency
Class MutableBoolean

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.util.concurrency.MutableBoolean

public class MutableBoolean
extends Object

This class is useful if threads are accessing a common variable (or for simulating reference parameters in methods).
